derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from German, literally badger dog' (the breed being originally used to dig badgers out of their setts)

entry.def: A dachshund is a small dog that has very short legs, a long body, and long ears.

means.word_mean: 1. small long-bodied short-legged German breed of dog having a short sleek coat and long drooping ears; suited for following game into burrows
